Articles.Content:
6 hours ago, m4ti140 said:

So... I hyperedited myself into the orbit of The Creator... and I explode no matter how far from the surface I put my ship... Is The Creator's orbit below The All's surface?

The Creator does not like visitors. I fixed it for 0.6.

On 3/22/2017 at 2:26 AM, StarCrusher96 said:

The Creator does not like visitors. I fixed it for 0.6.

Hi  

I was wondering as to what other mods you are awaiting updates for in order to release .6

Like an estimated time frame.... So excited for .6 !!!!

Hi  

I was wondering as to what other mods you are awaiting updates for in order to release .6

I'll post a list soon  I've planned 0.6 to be released by sunday next week.

Nice! I see you used my suggestion as the name for the archipelago planet

Also the sunspots add a nice touch.

Anyone else noticed Kelnis looks like it has a face?

Ah, the joy of sunspots!

Very well done!

17 hours ago, StarCrusher96 said:

Scatterer adds those flares - I edited the colors of the stars in KSS + the colors of the flares from Scatterer.

Nice man! I am making a mod alike yours called APES (AR3S' Planet Expansion for Stock), and I am looking for examples to copy from to make the sun a black hole. I have done it before, using Kerbal Binary's Motheris configuration. I wanted to say I love this mod but I would like to see some things implemented

1) Acceleration disk around The All

2) A new star system containing an ocean planet like the one from Interstellar

3) The star system could also have a burning gas giant

That is all, you do not have to implement things, they are just ideas

P.S: I might use them in my mod...

13 minutes ago, AR3S_TGL said:

Nice man! I am making a mod alike yours called APES (AR3S' Planet Expansion for Stock), and I am looking for examples to copy from to make the sun a black hole. I have done it before, using Kerbal Binary's Motheris configuration. I wanted to say I love this mod but I would like to see some things implemented

1) Acceleration disk around The All

2) A new star system containing an ocean planet like the one from Interstellar

3) The star system could also have a burning gas giant

That is all, you do not have to implement things, they are just ideas

P.S: I might use them in my mod...

thx

1. The All is not a black hole

2. Aquel from the Kerolon System

3. Hot Jool, Vael kinda burns.

Just now, StarCrusher96 said:

thx

2. Aquel from the Kerolon System

3. Hot Jool, Vael kinda burns.

Woop! Nice man! Quick reply!
Three stars in the same sky... Beautiful..

Nice pics! Is that Narath?

Edited March 26, 2017 by Greatness101

41 minutes ago, Greatness101 said:

Nice pics! Is that Narath?

I think so  

3 hours ago, Artem Kerman said:

Three stars in the same sky... Beautiful..

Pretty !
Duna Panorama

5 hours ago, Greatness101 said:

Nice pics! Is that Narath?

Judging by the size of Kernim and the color of the atmosphere, it appears to be Iain.

2 minutes ago, TheSpacePotato said:

Judging by the size of Kernim and the color of the atmosphere, it appears to be Iain.

The mystery continues!

Time to put on my detective hat (Unfortunately I couldn't get the pictures to show up)

Narath's sky is pinkish and Kernim is too small

Erel's sky is too orange and Kernim is too large.

Therefore the planet in the mystery picture must orbit between Erel and Narath. So it is probably Iain.

@TheSpacePotato Apon further investigation I believe that you are correct, good sir.  

Edited March 27, 2017 by Greatness101
